Description: ACS celebrates its 25th anniversary with over 1,900 members.
Chemical Abstracts, a comprehensive and separate journal of abstracts, debuts.
Industrial & Engineering Chemistry (I&EC) becomes the first official ACS Division.
Source(s): "The American Chemical Society at 125: A Recent History, 1976-2001"

Description:
The first five ACS Divisions were created, including:
 - Agricultural & Food Chemistry
 - Industrial & Engineering Chemistry
 - Organic Chemistry
 - Physical Chemistry
 - Fertilizer Chemistry
Source(s): "The American Chemical Society at 125: A Recent History, 1976-2001"
